template_references.comment: Use a dedicated thread pool for broker calls (1=on, 0=off)
Enable verbose debug output when set to 1
Proactive pacing instead of reactive blocking
Pause duration after max attempts exceeded
Stable time to reset attempt counter
Leave enabled for local testing (no real orders)
Pause after API health trip (5 min)
Pause after N broker read failures
Reserved for future risk overrides (currently unused)
Pause symbol on stale mark (2 min)
Pause symbol after N slippage failures
How often to poll WS health
Max age of last heartbeat before stale
Max age of last WS message before stale
